mutants.code:
def get_middle(word):
    length = len(word)
    middle_index = (length - 1) / 2
    return word[middle_index:middle_index + (2 if length % 2 == 0 else 1)]

def get_middle(word):
    length = len(word)
    middle_index = (length - 1) * 2
    return word[middle_index:middle_index + (2 if length % 2 == 0 else 1)]
